sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都表示"揭露，暴露"之意。
means: disclose ： 侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
expose ： 多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。
uncover ： 主要指移去遮盖物，让东西显露出来。也可指揭露阴谋、秘密等。
reveal ： 多指揭露一直隐藏或隐秘的东西，或启示超乎常人领导能力的真理。

stems_affixes.word_buile: un解开,去掉+veil面纱→v.取下面纱;揭露,吐露 v.露出真面目

stems_affixes.value_cn: 展现,显示,揭示,揭露,告诉,泄露
stems_affixes.word_buile: re反+veal=veil盖上,面纱→反盖上→不让盖上→揭露

sentence.cn: 这本书关注了很多重要的问题，比如:关于人性，科学揭示了什么?性格的形成原因是什么?为什么有些人快乐而成功，而有些人却不能?

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 透露真情的、有启迪作用的

entry.def: To reveal something means to make people aware of it.

example.ex: She has refused to reveal the whereabouts of her daughter...
example.tran: 她不肯透露她女儿的行踪。

example.ex: A survey of the British diet has revealed that a growing number of people are overweight...
example.tran: 对英国人饮食进行的一项调查显示有越来越多的人超重。

entry.def: If you reveal something that has been out of sight, you uncover it so that people can see it.

example.ex: A grey carpet was removed to reveal the original pine floor.
example.tran: 一块灰色的地毯被揭开，露出了原来的松木地板。

sentences.sentence: "He brings out the best in her"
"The newspaper uncovered the President's illegal dealings"

means.word_mean: 2. make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret;

sentences.sentence: "The auction house would not disclose the price at which the van Gogh had sold"
"The actress won't reveal how old she is"
"The article revealed the policies of the government"
"God rarely reveal his plans for Mankind"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French reveler or Latin revelare, from re- 'again' (expressing reversal) + velum 'veil'
late 17th cent.: from obsolete revale 'to lower', from Old French revaler, from re- 'back' + avaler 'go down, sink'

sentences.cn: 他没有泄露秘密,真是谨慎.
sentences.en: It was discreet of him not to reveal the secret.

sentences.cn: 他眼睛的快速转动泄露了他的不诚.
sentences.en: His insincerity is revealed by the quick goggle of his eyes.

sentences.cn: 泄露 ( 秘密)尤指从无意或无保留的谈话中泄露(秘密的事情 )
sentences.en: To reveal ( secret matters ) especially through indiscreet or unreserved talk.

sentences.cn: 签署决不泄露秘密的诺言;''.'捐钱'.''给慈善事业的诺言.
sentences.en: Signed a pledge never to reveal the secret ; a pledge of money to a charity.

sentences.cn: 我答应决不泄露他的秘密.
sentences.en: I promised never to reveal his secret.

sentences.cn: 千万不要把这个深藏的秘密泄露出去.
sentences.en: Be sure not to reveal the keep secret.

sentences.cn: 他从来不泄露自己的秘密.
sentences.en: He never revealed his secret.

sentences.cn: 他们想收买他让他保持缄默(不泄露秘密).
sentences.en: They tried to buy his silence, ie to pay him not to reveal a secret.

sentences.cn: 她的秘密被泄露之后,顿时面红耳赤.
sentences.en: Her face became full of flush after her secret was revealed.

sentences.cn: 他泄露了他们推翻政府的阴谋.
sentences.en: He revealed their conspiracy to overthrow the government.

sentences.cn: 我泄露了某件丢脸的事.
sentences.en: I would have been revealing something shameful.

sentences.cn: 不忠诚的助手把他的轻率举动泄露给了报纸.
sentences.en: Disloyal aides revealed his indiscretions to the papers.

sentences.cn: 他十分小心,不想在她面前泄露他曾经做过的事情.
sentences.en: He was careful not to reveal what he had done before her very eyes.

sentences.cn: 伊莱克斯不会泄露任何有关大幅降价的计划.
sentences.en: Electolux won't reveal any plans slash the price.

sentences.cn: 它能泄露许多普通婚姻的特殊秘密.
sentences.en: Most amazing of all, cameras can and clearly reveal to us our dreams.

sentences.cn: 这泄露天机的话语一下子泻了生活的底.
sentences.en: Such eternaljudgment at once reveals a secret of life.

sentences.cn: 他相信神要启示祂自己.
sentences.en: And he believed that God would reveal Himself.

sentences.cn: 最后, 从深刻的教训中揭示党的知识分子政策的现实启示.
sentences.en: In the last place, it reveals the actual apocalypse from the profound lessons.

sentences.cn: 我们可以做瑜伽的练习,它会启示我们何处阻挡了快乐.
sentences.en: We can do yoga practices which may reveal to us where are resisting happiness.

sentences.cn: 我用我的话语启示你, 但你却不在知识上追求长进.
sentences.en: I have revealed My Word to you, but you do not gain in knowledge.

sentences.cn: 问:上帝在自然界启示了 什么 ?
sentences.en: What does God reveal in nature?

sentences.cn: 然而,基督教宣告神至高的启示是在耶稣里.
sentences.en: But Christianity declares that God supremely revealed himself in Jesus.

sentences.cn: 这给我们一个启示,一般心肌梗塞的病例需将此一罕见的巨细胞动脉炎列入鉴别诊断,因其常有全身的表现.
sentences.en: The pathologic examination revealed myocardial infarction due to coronary giant cell arteritis.

sentences.cn: 在旧约里,神已经启示了他的圣洁.
sentences.en: God's holiness has been revealed in the Old Testament.

sentences.cn: 检查时肝脏的结节可能有启示性.
sentences.en: The presence of a nodular liver at the time of examination may be revealing.

sentences.cn: 我们的一切行为准则都应该符合神通过圣经所启示的真理.
sentences.en: We learn to take our marching orders from God's revealed truth as recorded in the scriptures.

sentences.cn: 主在十字架所说的七句话,向我们启示出他的心意和性情.
sentences.en: The seven words of our Lord on the cross reveal to us His mind and disposition.

sentences.cn: 圣经的神对我们说话,向我们启示祂自己.
sentences.en: The biblical God speaks and reveals himself.

sentences.cn: 圣灵也要荣耀基督, 而且把这位荣耀的基督在属天的爱和能力里启示出来.
sentences.en: The Spirit would glorify Christ, and would reveal the glorified Christ in heavenly love and power.

sentences.cn: 这个观念,和耶稣给我们的启示完全相反, 也和圣经所说的不同.
sentences.en: This is opposite to what Jesus revealed to us, and what the bible says.

sentences.cn: 牧师的启示不能使她重获信心.
sentences.en: The priest could not reveal her confidences.

sentences.cn: 最后,论文结合新的教学模式下进行有效地自主学习提出了一些应用启示.
sentences.en: This paper finally reveals some implications for effective autonomous learning in the new teaching model.

sentences.cn: 他还启示人在这场饥荒出现之前,埃及会有七年丰收.
sentences.en: He also revealed that those intervening years would be years of plenty in Egypt.

sentences.cn: 这句篡改广告词的新编版中超笑言揭示出中超的混乱.
sentences.en: Tamper with this new version of the ad reveals more than Xiaoyan over the chaos.

sentences.cn: 马克思主义揭示了档案信息增值的合理内核.
sentences.en: Marxism reveals the logical core of archive information multiplication.

sentences.cn: 心理学家已经揭示了过度的规定是无意义的.
sentences.en: Psychologists have long revealed the senselessness of such exaggerated regulation.

sentences.cn: 这次谋杀令克罗地亚人震惊, 揭示了犯罪组织和腐败的实力.
sentences.en: The murder stunned Croatia , revealing the grip of organised crime and corruption.

sentences.cn: 汝不得向非我族类揭示血族身世,违此诫律者当驱离血族,断其血缘.
sentences.en: Thou shalt not reveal true nature to those not of the Blood.

sentences.cn: 克莱姆揭示了他的十个戒律的交易 ( 诫 # 5: 小费是侍应生 ).
sentences.en: Cramer reveals his Ten Commandments of Trading ( Commandment # 5 : Tips are for waiters ).

sentences.cn: 通过对《巴克斯与阿里阿德涅》细节的分析,可以揭示出作品复杂而微妙的结构.
sentences.en: A detailed analysis of the painting Bacchus and Ariadne thus reveals a complex and subtle structure.

sentences.cn: 正是因为这场混乱揭示了一个更加深远的问题: 他们的商业模式过时了.
sentences.en: That is because the mess has revealed a far deeper problem: their business model is kaput.

sentences.cn: 而投资委员会揭示中国也是斯里兰卡最大的投资人.
sentences.en: The Board of Investment reveals it is the biggest investor, too.

sentences.cn: 因此他的旁注不是很有揭示性的.
sentences.en: So his marginalia are not very revealing.

sentences.cn: 圣经被认为是像神一样地揭示真理, 在历史性的文献中是独一无二的.
sentences.en: The Bible is believed to be divinely revealed truth, unique among historical texts.

sentences.cn: 尼考拉特斯拉1901年揭示能量能够通过ELF波经地面传输.
sentences.en: Nikola Tesla revealed in 1901 power could be transmitted through the ground using ELF waves.

sentences.cn: 麦尔维尔成功地塑造了亚哈这一悲剧英雄, 揭示出人与自然必须保持和谐统一关系的真理.
sentences.en: Melville successfully portrays Ahab, the tragic hero, to reveal that mankind and nature must be kept in harmony.

sentences.cn: 揭示了本县的地域异常规律,划分了重点地震危险区.
sentences.en: It reveals the unusual laws of this region and regionalizes the key earthquake hazardous areas.

sentences.cn: 它们揭示了哪些过去和现在的事?
sentences.en: What do they reveal about the past and the present?

sentences.cn: 英国《金融时报》的数据揭示出下滑的程度.
sentences.en: The FT's data reveal the extent of the downturn.

sentences.cn: 该书中发现、揭示和论证了一个十分重要的宇宙法则, 这个法则已经广泛地被我们推广和应用.
sentences.en: It discovers reveals and demonstrates a vital cosmic law, which has been extensively applied and popularized.

sentences.cn: 目的: 揭示综合性医院从事中药研究和开发的思路.
sentences.en: Objective : To reveal the idea of research and development of traditional Chinese medicine in general hospital.

sentences.cn: 表达序列标签 ( Expressedsequencetags,ESTs ) 是一种快速有效揭示基因容量的方法.
sentences.en: Expressed sequence tags ( ESTs ) is a prompt and effective method of revealing gene content.

sentences.cn: 这一结果揭示了荒漠化过程引起的生境破碎化.
sentences.en: This result reveals habitat fragmentation caused by the desertification in this region.

sentences.cn: 文章揭示了造成环境监测仪器的氨气敏电极损坏的原因,提出了延长其使用寿命的方法.
sentences.en: This article reveals reasons of damages on ammonic probe in environmental monitoring apparatus.

sentences.cn: 作品通过展示人物对他们生活中事件的反应和他们的喜怒哀乐来逐步揭示主人公的性格.
sentences.en: She reveals the protagonist's personality with his reactions to what happened to him.

sentences.cn: 节目会分析近年对尼斯湖水怪的常用结论,并揭示多年来研究者有关水怪的收获及图片.
sentences.en: This programme examines the favourite current theories and reveals undiscovered findings from the loch.

sentences.cn: 接下来作者分析并揭示.
sentences.en: Then authors analyze and reveal.

sentences.cn: 这本书深刻揭示了年轻人对自己的看法.
sentences.en: The book is very revealing about young people's views of themselves.

sentences.cn: 测试营销不会产生任何的利润,但是将揭示消费者的偏好.
sentences.en: This test launch is not expected to produce any profits but should reveal consumer preferences.

sentences.cn: 我们的分析揭示了这两个系统的矛盾.
sentences.en: Our analysis revealed contradictions between the two systems.

sentences.cn: 和冥王星可以揭示自己的自私, 贪婪, 和情感方面也削弱.
sentences.en: And Pluto can reveal the selfish, greedy, and emotionally crippling aspects of ourselves too.

sentences.cn: 调查揭示,对某些人来说,退休往往会造成心理上的病痛.
sentences.en: Investigation has revealed that retirement tends to cause psychological troubles for some people.

sentences.cn: 欧宝即将发布的2010年阿斯特拉已经内定揭示感谢德国出版汽车与运动.
sentences.en: Opel's upcoming 2010 Astra has been unofficially revealed thanks to German publication Auto Motor und Sport.

sentences.cn: 房门打开，一间温暖舒适的小屋展现在眼前。
sentences.en: The door opened to reveal a cosy little room.

sentences.cn: 他的那扇车窗宛若一幅精彩的画屏.每一分钟都展现出新的奇妙的景象.
sentences.en: His window was like a wondrous screen , revealing secrets by the minute.

sentences.cn: 画家对老农面部作了极为精细的刻画,展现了他的个性.
sentences.en: The painter meticulously drew the facial expression of the figure to reveal his personality.

sentences.cn: 白日的天光,把麦尔布礼先生的整个产业都展现在人们面前.
sentences.en: The daylight revealed the whole of Mr. Melbury's homestead.

sentences.cn: 技术展现的不仅仅是我们的人性, 有了技术我们才称之为人.
sentences.en: Technology not only reveals our humanness, it is the way we are human.

sentences.cn: 想象可以展现种种可能的世界面貌.
sentences.en: Imagination reveals what the world could be.

sentences.cn: 目前在亚微观世界展现弯曲空时的希望不大.
sentences.en: In the submicroscopic world , there is little prospect at present that curved spacetime will reveal itself.

sentences.cn: 最后, 我们将向绝地展现我们自己. 最后, 我们会为自己雪耻.
sentences.en: At last, we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last, we will have our revenge.

sentences.cn: 看到诺查丹玛斯手稿的最新近发现, 一个令人吃惊的对世界的全新视野展现在眼前.
sentences.en: Drawing on newly discovered Nostradamus manuscripts, a startling new view of the world was revealed.

sentences.cn: 沉闷的天气下花儿不会开放, 只有在阳光下它们才会充分展现自己的美丽.
sentences.en: On dull days the flowers remain closed, revealing their full beauty only in the sunshine.

sentences.cn: 不同螺旋的富含蛋白质结构的模型将会用来展现蛋白质螺旋的特性.
sentences.en: Various helical rich protein structure models will be used to reveal the properties of protein helices.

sentences.cn: 老人打开了纸包时,儿子的一幅画像顿时展现在眼前.
sentences.en: As the old man unwrappedthethe paper gave way to reveal a portrait the man's son.

sentences.cn: 你的脸展现出了你的许多个性.
sentences.en: Your face reveals much about your personality.

sentences.cn: 沮丧, 焦虑甚至爱,都以极为丑陋的方式展现出来.
sentences.en: Frustration, anxiety and even love revealing itself in the ugliest possible ways.

sentences.cn: 幕启时展现一幅农村景象.
sentences.en: The rising curtain revealed a countryside scene.

sentences.cn: 这张照片展现出了这位女警察娇柔的一面.
sentences.en: This photo reveals the gentle side of the policewoman.

sentences.cn: 如果我们不把一种数据类型的具体表示展现给用户,那麽我们称它是“抽象的”.
sentences.en: We call a data type abstract, if we do not reveal its representation to the user.

sentences.en: The front door opened to reveal a magnificent entrance hall.

sentences.cn: 通过不同品种, 产区, 土壤和气候的组合展现出独特的个性.
sentences.en: Allowed o reveal their own personality through a combination of variety, region, soil and climate.

sentences.cn: 展现艺术本身,艺术家却隐迹遁形——这是艺术的宗旨.
sentences.en: To reveal art and conceal the artist is art's aim.

sentences.cn: 哈伯以无比的精细程度展现了它们极端复杂的外型.
sentences.en: Hubble has revealed extraordinarily complex shapes in unprecedented detail.

sentences.cn: 这出戏的最后一场的帷幕升起来了,展现在观众面前的是那位贵族,他孤独地坐在铁栏后的那间黑暗的号房里.
sentences.en: The curtain went up on the final act of the play and revealed the aristocrat sitting alone behind bars in his dark cell.

sentences.cn: 白色烤漆泛着圣洁而高贵的光芒, 展现平和 、 恬静、奇幻的神韵.
sentences.en: White paint doors reflect saintly and noble sublimity, reveal mild, calm and fancy verve.

sentences.cn: 医治者展现一个吸引人的事实:康健是联邦的巨大财富.
sentences.en: The healer reveals an appealing fact that health is great wealth to commonwealth.

sentences.cn: 每当她微笑时,她那整齐的牙齿便被展现出来.
sentences.en: She reveals her even teeth whenever she smiles.

sentences.cn: 他脱下了衬衫展现出晒得黝黑的身体.
sentences.en: He took off his shirt to reveal his tanned torso.

sentences.cn: 海德格尔在后期倾注了极大的精力论说诗的展现本真存在的功能.
sentences.en: Heidegger had taken great effort to prove the function of language to reveal the being.

sentences.cn: 运动不会练就品格, 而会展现它.
sentences.en: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.

Sentence.sentence: A recent study of people with HSAM reveals that they are liable to fantasy and full absorption in an activity.
A recent Harris poll revealed that 79% of Americans say they enjoy cooking and 30% love it; 14% admit to not enjoying kitchen work and just 7% won't go near the stove at all.
A recent survey by a credit bureau revealed that the number of alarmed citizens had shot up to 76 percent.
The results reveal that while Swedes were the tallest people in the world in 1914, Dutch men have risen from 12th place to claim top spot with an average height of 182.5cm.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C
